title: About
content:
Pricing right respond to one question and only one:  how should I create my pricing page for my new shiny startup.

You could be a solopreneur, an enterpreneur, a youg bootstrap startuper or maybe the one in charge of the facelift of this pricing page.

STOP there, you find your nemesis
subtitle:
State of art consume a ton of time. It will give you headach and you lost faith in the process.
This is why, I decided to create Pricing right.
